title: A Day Forgotten
description: John was minding his own business, when he was caught in the middle of something he didn't quite understand. A run in with law left him hospitalized and confused.A Day Forgotten will keep you on the edge of your seat. A multitude of characters come to life with their own point of view.One question will remain constant at the end of each chapter: What happens next?Adult Fiction, Suspense, Mystery, Thriller
author: Eric Sonata
